name: Predefined: A Programming Puzzle Game
description:
Welcome to Predefined, an engaging 3D puzzle game where strategy, precision, and careful planning are vital! Enter the world of a clever little burrow navigating its way through intricate levels packed with challenges, obstacles, and enemies.

Programming Puzzle Game



Set the course for your burrow using the classic controls, keeping in mind the grid system that the game follows. Once you hit the Play button, watch your burrow execute the predefined commands that you've set while overcoming puzzles, dodging obstacles, outsmarting enemies, and timing their movements to catch moving platforms on their quest to reach the finish tile.

Each level brings a new set of challenges and complexities, requiring strategic thinking, intelligence, and problem-solving abilities.

Twitch Integrated: Let your chat solve the puzzles!



For Twitch streamers, Predefined offers an exciting feature - Twitch Integration. Streamers can enable their viewers to participate in the gameplay by providing commands through the chat. Experience the thrill of solving puzzles together as a community and see who has the skills to master the burrow!

Key Features:

- Intuitive Control System
- Grid-based Movement
- Challenging Puzzles, Obstacles, and Enemies
- Twitch Integration for Interactive Gameplay

Are you ready to put your strategy and planning skills to the test? Dive into the world of Predefined, and guide your burrow to the finish line, one puzzle at a time!
